name: Digital Connector Rainbow Watch Set with 600 Loom Bands
description:
Looking for a creative twist for your loom band creations? Make your designs stand out with our stylish bands and digital connector watches. Our digital connector watches are Picki Nicki exclusives so your creations will be very unique!

The watches are perfect for girls and boys who love to create with loom bands and are easy to loop into your creations. Check out our website www.pickinicki.com for tutorial videos on how to make bracelets using our watches and charms.

These sets make great gifts and stocking stuffers!

• Primary Colors Watch Set Includes: Red, Orange, Yellow, Blue and Green watches with 600 fluorescent Loom Bands.

Each set will include 5 watches, 600 loom bands and 20 connector clips. Loom creations are a fun fall and winter activity for after school, weekends, school breaks, car and plane rides, and more. The silicone bands are latex free and work with all major brand looms.

Warning: these items contain small parts that are a choking hazard. Not recommended for children under the age of three.
Have fun making your creations, we know you are going to love these sets!

name: 1800 Loom Bands with 6 Assorted Charms, Glitter, Glow in the Dark and Solids
description:
This set includes 6 assorted charms as shown. You will also receive 1800 loom bands and a set of connector clips. 600 Glow in the dark, 600 glitter and 600 solid assorted. 
Our bands work with all major brand name looms.

Have fun making your creations!

Warning- small parts are a choking hazard, not recommended for children under the age of three.

name: Assorted Fun Designs- 6 Charms with 600 Loom Bands
description:
This set includes 6 assorted fun charms. You will also receive 600 solid assorted loom bands and a set of connector clips. You can easily make six bracelets with this set and have plenty of bands left for making more creations.

Our bands work with all major brand name looms.

Have fun making your creations!

Warning- small parts are a choking hazard, not recommended for children under the age of three.
